entry.name: last
entry.title: .last()
entry.desc: Reduce the set of matched elements to the final one in the set.

longdesc.p: Given a jQuery object that represents a set of DOM elements, the .last() method constructs a new jQuery object from the last element in that set.
Consider a page with a simple list on it:
We can apply this method to the set of list items:
The result of this call is a red background for the final item.
